nodes.text: The Duro system, or Duros system, was a three-orbit system that contained the planet Duro.
In the Imperial era, the Duro system became one of the Outlier systems of the Corellian sector, being represented by Garm Bel Iblis in the Senate and run by Moff Fliry Vorru.[source?]
The Duro system was filled with vast orbiting cities and shipyards governed by the stockholders of these shipbuilding corporations.
The Pellezara station was located in the Duro system, a maintenance stopover for ships en route to Duro.
The Essential Guide to Planets and Moons and the PC game Star Wars: Rebellion both identify this system as the Duros system.
